comment: Yeah, he's hard. But the good thing is that there are no group activities, presentations or any high school things. He's an old school professor. He lectures and you take a test. He gives reviews and it's up to you to study. (Paper at the end of course also.)
I'm sure he's a fine officer, but he's not a teacher.

The hardest professor I have ever taken at KSU.  Even when you study, the tests are totally hard and you barely have time to complete them! Stay away from this professor! If you want to pass, take this course with another professor if you can.

This professor is one of the most hardest professors I have taken. His paper is difficult to get a good grade on considering the considering the level of expectation that he wants in it. He is a powerpoint head and reads strictly off of it and goes fast. He maybe a excellent officer but he is not a good professor

One of my top five favorite professors! Better for higher level classes because he has been in the police/ police administration field for a good number of years and has a very professional personailty.

If you're a cop, you're in good shape, because he definitely has his favorites. His tests are easy, his papers are impossible due to his stringent grading on grammar and such. All his presentations are the same, b&w power point that is repetitive, boring, and nothing to do with the reading. You will regret taking this professor.

This has got to be the worst teacher i've ever had. He's boring, and he picks favorites. Also, he's grammatically impaired and takes it out on you on your essay. I got points off on my essay for doing MLA correctly! I ended up getting an F on the essay, because he has an apparent inability to read and will ignore complete portions of your paper..:(

As a cop, I'm sure he does a wonderful job, but as a professor its another story.  His lack of available communication channels is a problem, he only lists an email address on the syllabus.  He never cites the text book, but instead provides his only material without revealing the sources.  The class is boring, especially in the morning.

As cuddly as a wet blanket and as exciting as dry toast.  I've seen more personality in an oil painting.  You will NOT be able to stay awake for long! The class was sorta easy, but so boring you'll want to rip your flesh off just to stay awake.  His law enforcement experience is confined to being a professional desk jockey. Take Mr. Clack instead.
i liked this prof.....not alot of grades in this class.....very hard for an intro class
I liked the professor a lot, however the class was extremely hard for an intro.
Power point all class, every day. Tough grading. Good guy but screws up your grade because he has a stick in his ass.
